articles.title: Longest partial eclipse of century to occur on 19 November: Here's everything you need to know - Firstpost
articles.description: The eclipse will be witnessed in large parts of Australia, East Asia, North America, South America, and the Pacific Region. In the United States, all 50 states will be able to view the partial lunar eclipse.
articles.content:
FP TrendingNov 08, 2021 16:36:14 IST
Astronomers and space enthusiasts will witness the longest partial lunar eclipse of the century overnight on 18-19 November this year, according to the National … [+1953 chars]

articles.title: Haidilao to close or suspend 300 restaurants this year - AsiaOne

articles.title: Kāpiti man prepares for his own death as euthanasia law begins - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Steve Smith could be one of the first New Zealanders to make use of a new law, allowing the terminally ill to end their own lives.
articles.content:
Steve Smith will have a last conversation with his wife then die at a preset time in her arms.
 "For me, it is a tiredness-of-life choice because of pain but also because I have no quality of life a… [+4027 chars]

articles.title: Man in Brazil dies after jumping into piranha-infested lake to escape swarm of bees - AsiaOne
articles.description: A man in Brazil reportedly died after jumping into a lake to escape a swarm of bees, only to be partially devoured by flesh-eating piranhas. His mangled body was found last Sunday (Oct 31), although it was initially unclear if he had died by drowning before b…
articles.content:
